item.description:
- Stiff  hips?         - Sleepless nights?       - Liver problems?

Try `Circle Qi` Qi Gong!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Qi (pronounced “chee”) is vital life energy or force. Gong (“kung”) is practice, workout.

Qi Gong is a well known Chinese exercise that is becoming more and more popular.

`Cirlce Qi`  Qi Gong  involves mind focus, deep and well controlled breathing  and  body movements that make your lower body stronger and more flexible.  This form includes exercises for improving the energy flow in your inner organs, stimulating your digestive tract and your liver.

It strengthens your knees and increase the blood flow in your hip joints.

Qi Gong is an active way to meditate and also to manipulate energy and direct it with an intention of your mind. Come and experience the full benefits

of a relaxed mind and energized body after this Qi Gong practice.

 

Qi Gong helps to prevent and heal many ailments such as back pain, neck pain, problems with muscles, joints, and tendons, poor circulation, gastrointestinal disorders, hypertension, anxiety, stress, depression and many other illnesses.

It provides mental alertness, a positive attitude, and emotional balance.
item.name: `Circle Qi` Qi Gong
